svg.text: View Match Details Use Case
Use Case Specification
Use Case Name:
View Match Details
Actor(s):
Regular User
Description:
Displays comprehensive information about a specific match including host details,
participant list, venue information, skill requirements, and available actions.
Preconditions:
1. User must be logged in
2. Match must exist and be accessible to the user
Main Flow:
1. User clicks "View Details" from match card or recommendation
2. System retrieves complete match information from database
3. System displays match title, description, and sport type
4. System shows host profile information and contact details
5. System lists current participants with profile links
6. System displays venue details (court, address, facilities)
7. System shows date, time, duration, and skill level requirements
8. System presents available actions (Join, Leave, Report)
9. System displays participant count and availability status
10. System shows match compatibility score if applicable
Alternative Flows:
A1. Own hosted match: System shows edit and cancel options instead of join
A2. Already joined: System displays "Joined" status with leave option
A3. Match full: System shows waitlist option and full status
A4. Past match: System displays historical information without join option
A5. Private match: System shows limited details based on privacy settings
